Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimize a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints. The most fundamental and widely applied type.

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: An LP where some decision variables are constrained to be integers. Adds combinatorial complexity.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimize a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints. A very broad category.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: A special case of NLP where the objective is quadratic and constraints are linear. Common in economics and finance.

Name: Constraint Programming
Description: Focus on finding feasible solutions that satisfy all constraints
Solvability: often used for scheduling and puzzles.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: A special case of MILP where *all* decision variables are integers.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Breaks a complex problem into simpler subproblems and solves them recursively. A method

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Optimization under uncertainty. Parameters are known only by their probability distributions.

Name: Multi-Objective Optimization
Example: objectives to optimize simultaneously. Seeks a set of Pareto-optimal solutions.
